text: A capital region, also called a national capital region, capital district or capital territory, is a region or district surrounding a capital city. It is not always the official term for the region, but may sometimes be used as an informal synonym. ==First-level administrative country subdivisions== List of first-level administrative country subdivisions containing the terms "capital" and "region" in the English name English name Local name Country Australian Capital Territory Brussels-Capital Region Brussels Hoofdstedelijk Gewest Région de Bruxelles-Capitale National Capital Region Région de la capitale nationale Capital Region of Denmark Region Hovedstaden Capital Region of Helsinki Huvudstadsregionen Pääkaupunkiseutu Capital Region Höfuðborgarsvæðið National Capital Region (NCR) राष्ट्रीय राजधानी क्षेत्र Special Capital Region of Jakarta Daerah Khusus Ibu Kota Jakarta National Capital Region Islamabad Capital Territory وفاقی دارالحکومت اسلام آباد National Capital Region Pambansang Punong Rehiyon Hanoi Capital Region Vùng thủ đô Hà Nội ==Second- level administrative country subdivisions== Capital region name Subnational entity Edmonton Capital Region Capital Regional District Capital District Capitale-Nationale Winnipeg Capital Region Cardiff Capital Region ==References== Category:Regions
title: Capital region
